title.description: A reference for the artwork or object in the image.
title.title: Title {Artwork or Object detail}

contentDescription.description: A textual description of the content depicted in the artwork or object.
contentDescription.title: Content Description {Artwork or Object detail}

physicalDescription.description: A textual description of the physical characteristics of the artwork or object, without reference to the content depicted.
physicalDescription.title: Physical Description {Artwork or Object detail}

creatorNames.title: Creator {Artwork or Object detail}
creatorNames.description: Contains the name of the artist who has created artwork or an object in the  image. In cases where the artist could or should not be identified the name of a company or organisation may be appropriate.

creatorIdentifiers.title: Creator ID {Artwork or Object detail}
creatorIdentifiers.description: Globally unique identifier for the creator of artwork or object.

contributionDescription.description: A textual description about a contribution made to an artwork or an object.
contributionDescription.title: Contribution Description {Artwork or Object detail}

stylePeriod.title: Style Period {Artwork or Object detail}
stylePeriod.description: The style, historical or artistic period, movement, group, or school whose characteristics are represented in the artwork or object.

dateCreated.title: Date Created {Artwork or Object detail}
dateCreated.description: Designates the date and optionally the time the artwork or object in the image was created. This relates to artwork or objects with associated intellectual property rights.

circaDateCreated.title: Circa Date Created {Artwork or Object detail}
circaDateCreated.description: Approximate date or range of dates associated with the creation and production of an artwork or object or its components.

source.title: Source {Artwork or Object detail}
source.description: The organisation or body holding and registering the artwork or object in the image for inventory purposes.

sourceInventoryNr.title: Source Inventory Number {Artwork or Object detail}
sourceInventoryNr.description: The inventory number issued by the organisation or body holding and registering the artwork or object in the image.

sourceInventoryUrl.title: Source Inventory URL {Artwork or Object detail}
sourceInventoryUrl.description: URL reference to the metadata record of the inventory maintained by the Source.

currentCopyrightOwnerName.title: Current Copyright Owner Name {Artwork or Object detail}
currentCopyrightOwnerName.description: Name of the current owner of the copyright of the artwork or object.

currentCopyrightOwnerIdentifier.title: Current Copyright Owner ID {Artwork or Object detail}
currentCopyrightOwnerIdentifier.description: Globally unique identifier for the current owner of the copyright of the artwork or object.

copyrightNotice.description: Contains any necessary copyright notice for claiming the intellectual property for artwork or an object in the image and should identify the current owner of the copyright of this  work with associated intellectual property rights.
copyrightNotice.title: Copyright Notice {Artwork or Object detail}

currentLicensorName.title: Current Licensor Name {Artwork or Object detail}
currentLicensorName.description: Name of the current licensor of the artwork or object.

currentLicensorIdentifier.title: Current Licensor ID {Artwork or Object detail}
currentLicensorIdentifier.description: Globally unique identifier for the current licensor of the artwork or object.

emailwork.title: Email address(es) {contact info detail}
emailwork.description: The contact information email address part.

region.title: State/Province {contact info detail}
region.description: The contact information part denoting regional information such as state or province.

phonework.title: Phone number(s) {contact info detail}
phonework.description: The contact information phone number part.

weburlwork.title: Web URL(s) {contact info detail}
weburlwork.description: The contact information web address part. Multiple addresses can be given.  May have to be separated by a comma in the user interface.

address.title: Address {contact info detail}
address.description: The contact information address part. Comprises an optional company name and all required information to locate the building or postbox to which mail should be sent. To that end, the address is a multiline field.

postalCode.title: Postal Code {contact info detail}
postalCode.description: The contact information part denoting the local postal code.

cvId.title: CV-Term CV ID {CV-Term detail}
cvId.description: The globally unique identifier of the Controlled Vocabulary the term is from.

cvTermName.description: The natural language name of the term from a Controlled Vocabulary.
cvTermName.title: CV-Term name {CV-Term detail}

cvTermId.title: CV-Term ID {CV-Term detail}
cvTermId.description: The globally unique identifier of the term from a Controlled Vocabulary.

cvTermRefinedAbout.title: Refined 'about' Relationship of the CV-Term {CV-Term detail}
cvTermRefinedAbout.description: The refined 'about' relationship of the term with the content.
